titles.title: To extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of the AuSable Hydroelectric Project in New York, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 9/25/1996--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of a specified licensee, to extend for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods the time required for commencement of construction of the AuSable Hydroelectric Project in New York.
